items.sentence: Tom sat alone in his room, waiting by the phone.
What I\'m looking for looks something like this.
I\'ll come straight to the point. You\'re fired.
It looks like something\'s going to happen soon.
It looks like you\'re pretty good at doing that.
It may be harder to do than you think it\'ll be.
The two men sitting on the bench were Americans.
The whereabouts of the suspect is still unknown.
The whole school turned out to welcome Tom back.
There are many interesting animals in Australia.
